name: Windows Execute net user /ADD
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
Chris John Riley
vlad902 <vlad902@gmail.com>
sf <stephen_fewer@harmonysecurity.com>
description:
Create a new user and add them to local administration group.

        Note: The specified password is checked for common complexity
        requirements to prevent the target machine rejecting the user
        for failing to meet policy requirements.

        Complexity check: 8-14 chars (1 UPPER, 1 lower, 1 digit/special)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: PrependMigrate
options.description: Spawns and runs shellcode in new process

options.name: PrependMigrateProc
options.description: Process to spawn and run shellcode in

options.name: EXITFUNC
options.description: Exit technique (Accepted: '', seh, thread, process, none)

options.name: CUSTOM
options.description: Custom group name to be used instead of default

options.name: WMIC
options.description: Use WMIC on the target to resolve administrators group
